wrinkle.translation[0].definitions[0].de: wrinkles are lines on your face and skin that you get when you are old
wrinkle.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Her face was a mass of wrinkles.
wrinkle.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a small untidy fold in a piece of clothing or paper
wrinkle.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She walked over to the bed and smoothed out the wrinkles.
wrinkle.translation[1].definitions[0].de: if you wrinkle a part of your face, or if it wrinkles, small lines appear on it
wrinkle.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Alex wrinkled up her nose at the smell.
Carter wrinkled his forehead in concentration.
His brow wrinkled when he saw us.
wrinkle.translation[1].definitions[1].de: if a piece of clothing wrinkles, it gets small untidy folds in it
wrinkle.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: The trouble with linen is that it wrinkles so easily.
